name: The Music Box (BunnyGun)
description:
Your friend has dared you to get Agatha Winchester's music box from the old Cemetery. Do you have what it takes to face your fears and fight off monsters along the way?

NOTE FOR GEAR VR USERS:
For a store invite to download, please email nate@bunnygun.com
(this will be much easier than trying to run the APK)

Thank you!
